definition: to err/to make a mistake/to do the wrong thing
to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)
mistake/wrong/bad/interlocking/complex/to grind/to polish/to alternate/to stagger/to miss/to let slip/to evade/to inlay with gold or silver
surname Cuo

sentences.english: Errors indeed in this virtue of goodness, or charity, may be committed.
sentences.chinese: 但人性中這種仁善的傾向，有時也會犯錯誤。

sentences.english: She had too little faith in mankind not to know that they were erring .
sentences.chinese: 她對男人們沒有信心，知道他們總要犯錯誤的。

sentences.english: Yesterday I made mistakes, then I correct them today and warn myself not to mistake again.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我犯錯了，於是我今天改過並告誡自己不可重犯。

sentences.english: But in our experience, too many managers err on the side of mistrust.
sentences.chinese: 但在我們的經驗中，有太多的管理員在不信任上犯錯。

sentences.english: I enjoy being made fun of. I enjoy making mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 我不怕被別人取笑，我不怕犯錯。

sentences.english: By ignorance we mistake, and by mistake we learn.
sentences.chinese: 無知使人犯錯，有錯當懲前毖後。

sentences.english: During my salad days when I was green in judgement I often blundered.
sentences.chinese: 少不更事時期，我的判斷力幼稚，常犯錯誤。

sentences.english: You just have to try not to make any mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 你要做的是儘量不犯錯誤。

sentences.english: We should not laugh at those who make mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 我們不應該嘲笑犯錯誤的人。

sentences.english: And they’re all making mistakes because To Err Is Human.
sentences.chinese: 兩邊都在犯錯誤，因爲是人總會犯錯。

sentences.english: And they’re all making mistakes because To Err Is Human.
sentences.chinese: 兩邊都在犯錯誤，因爲是人總會犯錯。

sentences.english: You got me trippin, stumbling, flippin, fumbling.
sentences.chinese: 你令我支吾，結巴，冒失，犯錯，笨拙。

sentences.english: The government is probably doing something wrong. It should explain its actions.
sentences.chinese: 政府部門可能正在犯錯誤，爲此它必須作出解釋。

sentences.english: Paul has erred in his predictions, although not often.
sentences.chinese: 保羅的預測也有過犯錯，儘管不多。

sentences.english: Don't be afraid to make mistakes, just take note not to repeat them again.
sentences.chinese: 別怕犯錯，記下來不犯同樣的錯誤就好。

definition: error/mistake/CL:個|个[ge4]/mistaken/false/wrong
to blame/to criticize/condemnation/reproach
to make an error
mistake/fault/responsibility (for a fault)
lesson/moral/to chide sb/to lecture sb
to blame/to rebuke
whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means
as it should be by rights (idiom); proper and to be expected as a matter of course/inevitable and right
to admit/to concede/to recognize/recognition (diplomatic, artistic etc)/to acknowledge
penalty/punishment/to punish
to admit an error/to acknowledge one's mistake
to compromise/to reach terms/a compromise
timidity/timid/cowardly
in no way/not in the least/absolutely not
conversely/in reverse order/in an opposite direction
to turn a blind eye to/to ignore
